name: Apples&Leafs (PatrickIbach)
description:
FALL THEMED

Summer is over and nature is getting ready for winter. A lot of tasty apples are falling from the trees, but the leafs are falling too.

Take your basket and try to collect as many falling apples as possible. All the while you dont want to get any wet leafs mixed up with your fresh apples, so you have to be extremely cautious to avoid them.

ARCADE GAME

Every time you collect an apple, your score increases. Catching even a single leaf will lose you the game.

This is getting increasingly difficult, as the amount of falling apples and leafs increases with your score. 

You are playing to beat your own highscore or the one of your friends. The only thing limiting your highscore is your own skill. Try your best and never give up!

CHALLENGE

Do you find it way too easy?

Do you want to compare your highscore with someone?

Show your skill and beat the highscore of the game developer! Can you get your score above 78?

Write a comment down below and let me know when you managed to beat the developer highscore of 78.
